Howard Charles Cannon nke Atọ (September 23, 1955 na March 29, 2016), nke a maara dị ka Twilly Cannon, bụ onye America na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na ikpe ziri ezi.
A mụrụ Cannon na Newark, New Jersey na Barbara na Howard Cannon Jr
ma too na Point Pleasant Beach, New Jersey
Ọ gara Christian Brothers Academy na Lincroft na The Evergreen State College

Na 1995, ya na Mike Roselle tọrọ ntọala Ruckus Society, òtù na-adịghị akwụ ụgwọ nke na-akwado ịkekọrịta nkà na ọzụzụ ọzụzụ na-adịghị eme ihe ike, atụmatụ na ndụmọdụ maka ndị na-eme ihe ike na ndị na-ahazi site n'ihu na emetụta obodo ndị na-arụ ọrụ na ikpe ziri ezi nke ọha mmadụ, ikike mmadụ, ikike ịkwaga mba ọzọ
, ikike ndị ọrụ na ikpe ziri ezi gburugburu ebe obibi.
Ọ nwụrụ na Brielle, New Jersey, mgbe ọ dị afọ 60.
